    • Method Detail

      • canWhack

        boolean canWhack(EntityPlayer player,
               ItemStack crowbar,
               int x,
               int y,
               int z)
        Controls non-rotational interactions with blocks. Crowbar specific stuff. Rotational interaction is handled by the Block.rotateBlock() function, which should be called from the Item.onUseFirst() function of your tool.
        Parameters:
        player -
        crowbar -
        x -
        y -
        z -
        Returns:
